reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater set comfortable and well-fitting, with the top and skirt not being too tight.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Winter Brunch Outfit at a Great Price
items.body: I bought this two piece set for my engagement brunch in the winter and it was perfect. Super comfy and really cute. I ordered both a small and an extra small to compare and the XS ended up being the better fit. For reference, I’m 5’6” and 118 lbs. What made it even better is that I’ve seen this exact same set on other websites for twice the price so this felt like a total win. Great quality, flattering fit, and such a good value. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Grace Werran

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute two piece sweater dress!!
items.body: I wore this sweater dress for my bachelorette and my rehearsal dinner! It was so cute and comfortable and I got so many compliments on it. It has good stretch to it but the material is high quality. The color is a true white. I purchased a small and I’m 5’8” and 143lbs. I have a longer torso and shorter legs. Read more
items.author: OkayyKassie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised!
items.body: I’ve been looking for a little set like this that doesn’t cost a fortune for a while and this one is pretty good! The color is just as pictured and really lovely. The weight of the material is actually very decent at this price point and at least in the brown that I ordered not see through at all. I ordered a medium. I’m 5’3 and 150 lbs. I think the skirt is perfect but wish the top was a bit larger but that’s a caveat of being a short curvy woman. The top is also pretty cropped which is not a surprise if you look at the pics but don’t be expecting to tuck it in the way you see in some of the pics unless you buy oversized or have a very short torso. I haven’t washed it yet so I can attest to how it holds up with laundering but I would guess it will be fine if washed inside out on delicate in cold water and tumble dried low. Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute winter set!
items.body: This was the cutest set for my engagement party in January! It kept me warm and not too hot for the event. I got so many compliments on it and I think it is perfect for any body type. Nothing is too tight and it stretches just enough! Not that see through at all. Read more
items.author: Ryleigh Bethea

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Set
items.body: Loved the material and design of the outfit! Unfortunately, will the skirt fit well (XS) the top was too big and boxy for me ( also XS.) Read more
items.author: Shopgirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprising LOVED
items.body: I ordered this for family pictures after my original dresses packages were delayed and it was the best blessing in disguise because I loved this so much more than the ones I had ordered. I ordered a medium and it was the perfect fit - not too snug but comfortable. The material quality wasn’t itchy at all it was super soft. Provided great warmth for the cold months which none of the others did but I also didn’t sweat. Color was light and the perfect soft shade of off white. Perfect in my opinion. Read more
items.author: Meagan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeds expectations
items.body: I am very impressed with the quality of this sweater/skirt outfit. I like the style and fit of the sweater as well as the drape of the skirt. The material is thick and cozy. The fit is true to size; shrinks a bit after first wash but does not change size. I am wearing the skirt and sweater separately, so I have two outfits from the set. The quality and design were better than I anticipated. Read more
items.author: LM Santoyo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly soft sweater set with a beautiful fit and color
items.body: I bought this white ribbed sweater set in a size small for an upcoming Friendsgiving (and other fall/winter events). I’m 5'4" and 125 lbs., and it fits true to size. My very first impression was how unbelievably soft it is. The material feels cozy and smooth in a way that surprised me. The top and skirt both have a nice thickness that feels comfortable without being heavy. It is not see through, but it also is not the kind of thick sweater that would make you hot during an indoor gathering. The color is beautiful and looks clean and classic. The overall fit on me is good. The skirt and top are not too tight or too loose, and the set has a comfortable, easy feel. Pros: • One of the softest sweater materials I have ever felt • True to size in the small • Not see through • Comfortable thickness that works for both indoor and outdoor fall events • Beautiful color that looks classic and clean • Fits comfortably without being clingy or heavy Cons: • Not very flattering on my athletic build since I do not have much waist or curve, so the silhouette does not add shape for me Verdict: I think this sweater set would look amazing on someone with more natural shape or height. The material and color are absolutely perfect, and I wish it worked better on my body type because I seriously love it. Anyone with a defined waist or curves would probably look incredible in it. I tend to scour reviews before buying things, so I hope I can pay it forward and that someone finds this helpful! Read more
items.author: Useful University | Julia & Marc

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
